column4: does anyone know what could cause my computer to struggle to download at speeds greater than 30Kb/s whenever i download anything via wget in the terminal. my computer is plugged directly into the AT&T U-Verse Gateway and the plan i'm on is supposed to allow download speeds of 300Mb/s
ok so apparently it's not just me having issues downloading the Karmic beta live cd iso.
im doing updates and its sloooooooooooooooooooooooooo
